channel.title: Cellular Activities on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Cellular Activities on funPlantGenes

item.title: GhADF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A09G0773 Gene Symbol: GhADF6 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: GhADF6-mediated actin reorganization is associated with defence against Verticillium dahliae infection in cotton.

item.title: GhADF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D09G0714 Gene Symbol: GhADF6 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: GhADF6-mediated actin reorganization is associated with defence against Verticillium dahliae infection in cotton.

item.title: HvCEN
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU2Hr1G072750 Gene Symbol: HvCEN Gene Name: CENTRORADIALIS Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Global transcriptome profiling in developing shoot apices and inflorescences of mutant and wild-type plants revealed that HvCEN controlled transcripts involved in chromatin remodeling activities, cytokinin and cell cycle regulation and cellular respiration under LDs and short days, whereas HvCEN affected floral homeotic genes only under LDs.
